scripts.compile.dev.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome.dev.rb && TARGET=chrome.dev webpack --watch
scripts.compile.apps.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome.apps && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome-apps.rb && NODE_ENV=prod TARGET=www/chrome webpack
scripts.compile.dev.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox.dev && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_firefox.dev.rb && TARGET=firefox.dev webpack --watch
scripts.compile.prod.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=prod TARGET=chrome webpack && compass compile -c config_chrome.rb
scripts.compile.prod.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=prod TARGET=firefox webpack && compass compile -c config_firefox.rb
scripts.compile.stage.chrome: npm run clean.build.chrome && npm run copy.assets && compass compile -c config_chrome.rb && NODE_ENV=stage TARGET=chrome webpack --watch
scripts.compile.stage.firefox: npm run clean.build.firefox && npm run copy.assets && NODE_ENV=stage TARGET=firefox webpack && compass compile -c config_firefox.rb
scripts.build.windows: npm run compile.apps.chrome && npm run delete.integrations && npm run delete.contentScripts && npm run inject.electron.desktop && node build-windows.js
scripts.build.linux: npm run compile.apps.chrome && npm run delete.integrations && npm run delete.contentScripts && npm run inject.electron.desktop && node build-linux.js
scripts.build.desktop: npm run clean.build.desktop && npm run build.windows && npm run build.linux
scripts.build.dev.all: npm run compile.dev.chrome  &&  npm run compile.dev.firefox && npm run build.desktop && npm run build.android
scripts.build.android: npm run clean.build.android && npm run compile.apps.chrome && npm run delete.integrations && npm run delete.contentScripts &&  npm run copy.files.android && npm run change.version.android && npm run signing.android
scripts.start.electron: npm run compile.apps.chrome && npm run inject.electron.desktop && electron .
